00020 #include "agg_render_buffer.h"
00021 #include "agg_scanline.h"
00022 #include "agg_render_argb32_solid.h"
00023 
00024 namespace agg
00025 {
00026 
00027 
00028     //-------------------------------------------------------------------------
00029     //
00030     //-------------------------------------------------------------------------
00031     void render_argb32_solid::render(scanline* sl)
00032     {
00033         if(!sl->reset_iterator(rbuf()->get_clip_box())) return;
00034 
00035         unsigned char* start = rbuf()->get_row(sl->get_y());
00036         register unsigned num_spans = sl->get_num_spans();
00037 
00038         while(num_spans--)
00039         {
00040             if(sl->next_span())
00041             {
00042                 register const unsigned char* covers = sl->get_covers();
00043                 register unsigned count = sl->get_count();
00044                 register unsigned char* pix_ptr = start + (sl->get_x() << 2);
00045 
00046                 while(count--)
00047                 {
00048                     register int alpha = (*covers++) * m_a;
00049                     register int b = pix_ptr[0];
00050                     register int g = pix_ptr[1];
00051                     register int r = pix_ptr[2];
00052                     register int a = pix_ptr[3];
00053                     *pix_ptr++ = (((m_a - a) * alpha) + (a << 16)) >> 16;
00054                     *pix_ptr++ = (((m_r - r) * alpha) + (r << 16)) >> 16;
00055                     *pix_ptr++ = (((m_g - g) * alpha) + (g << 16)) >> 16;
00056                     *pix_ptr++ = (((m_b - b) * alpha) + (b << 16)) >> 16;
00057                 }
00058             }
00059         }
00060     }
00061 
00062 
00063 
00064 }
